name: empower-pro-blocks
description: Custom blocks for Empower Pro Blocks theme.
author: Web Plant Media

scripts.start: wp-scripts start & npm run compile & npm run sass
scripts.compile: node-sass --output-style compressed --indent-width 1 --indent-type tab --source-map build/map src/blocks.scss --output build & node-sass --output-style compressed --indent-width 1 --indent-type tab --source-map build/map src/theme.scss --output build & node-sass --output-style compressed --indent-width 1 --indent-type tab --source-map build/map src/editor.scss --output build & node-sass --output-style compressed --indent-width 1 --indent-type tab --source-map build/map src/woocommerce.scss --output build
scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style compressed --indent-width 1 --indent-type tab --source-map build/map --watch src --output build
